title: Five-Star Chennai Suite Stay with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Hidden on Old Mahabalipuram Road amid three acres of lush greenery within South Chennai - just over six hours from Bangalore - Novotel Chennai OMR Hotel is an unforgettable destination for the luxury traveller. Whether you're staying for business or pleasure, don't look beyond this five-star urban sanctuary - you can even bring your furry best friend thanks to a pet-friendly hotel policy. Within you'll discover exquisite facilities, including one of Chennai's finest Asian cafés, a glittering outdoor pool, an indulgent spa, adventurous outdoor activities and more.

When the city lights beckon, you'll find yourself in close proximity to ECR Beach, Elcot SEZ IT Park, famous temples and the Madras shopping district.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin your stay with a non-alcoholic welcome drink on arrival
- Every morning kicks off with buffet breakfast at The Square
- Once per stay, sit down for a three-course or buffet dinner for two at The Square
- Enjoy nightly cocktail hour with light bites for two at NICO Asian Bar & Café
- Relax with a 15-minute foot reflexology massage for two, once per stay (subject to availability and government orders)
- Take advantage of complimentary access to 25+ outdoor and indoor activities
- Make the most of your stay with a 15% discount on soft drinks and dining at The Square
- Kids can enjoy cookies and hot chocolate on one night of your stay at The Square
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi

**Travelling with family?** Two kids (11 and under) stay free in existing bedding with all package inclusions (excludes alcohol and reflexology treatment).

**Want to bring your pet?** The hotel boasts a pet-friendly policy, which means you can have your furry best friend tag along. Plus, the hotel has a special menu curated just for them (surcharges apply). Please contact the hotel for further information.
offer_address: Opp. Elcot Sez, It Expressway, Old Mahabalipuram Rd, Sholinganallur, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600119

title: ITC Luxury in Chennai
description: Spend a long weekend in Chennai, the keeper of South Indian artistic, religious and culinary traditions. Indulge in a weekend away at the luxurious ITC Grand Chola - one of the largest and most luxurious hotels in the country and part of Marriott's Luxury Collection - and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, one buffet dinner for two, a luxurious 4pm checkout and 25% off spa treatments.
offer_address: 63, Mount Road, Guindy Institutional Area, Little Mount, Guindy, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600032, India

title: Historic South India Five-Star Chennai City Break
description: Embrace timeless South Indian elegance with a five-star stay at Taj Coromandel Chennai. Host to countless famed figures throughout its extensive history - including English royalty and US presidents - the hotel stands as an icon of refined opulence in the heart of India’s beguiling 'Capital of the South.' Between adventures, savour authentic cuisine at Southern Spice, Cantonese plates at Golden Dragon and steeped sips at Tea Lounge.
offer_address: 37 Uthamar Gandhi Road, Tirumurthy Nagar, Nungambakkam, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600034, India

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Chennai Omr It Expressway
title: Chennai City Stay Minutes from Thiruvanmiyur Beach
description: Only minutes from the sea, Holiday Inn Chennai OMR IT Expressway, an IHG Hotel, is a soothing oasis with easy access to the Tamil Nadu capital's hottest destinations. Amble alongside the seashore of Thiruvanmiyur Beach or stay in to take advantage of the outdoor pool. Savour global cuisines at the onsite restaurant, indulge in a day of adventure at the VGP Universal Kingdom theme park or take a walk on the wild side with a safari at Arignar Anna Zoological Park.
location_description: Holiday Inn Chennai OMR IT Expressway, an IHG Hotel

title: Chennai Waterfront Palace Stay with Six Restaurants & Bars
description: Experience regal opulence and renowned hospitality at the five-star The Leela Palace Chennai, set within the waterfront district of Chennai on the confluence of the Bay of Bengal and Adyar River. Each of the exceptionally comfortable rooms and suites boasts luxe, Chettinad-inspired interiors, and this theme is elegantly woven throughout the sprawling hotel set on 4.8 acres. Go beyond the ornate facade and discover The Spa, or visit one of six mouthwatering eateries and bars including China XO for fine dining, The Cake Shop for fresh pastries and Library Blu for delicious cocktails. Guests can also enjoy access to the glistening swimming pool and a state-of-the-art health club, or admire the decorated walls and the enviable collection of artworks peppered across the hotel.
offer_address: Adyar Sea Face, Leela Palace Rd, MRC Nagar, Raja Annamalai Puram, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600028, India

title: Stylish Chennai Stay Minutes from the Airport with Lush Gardens & Outdoor Pool
description: Experience the vibrant culture of Chennai with a stay at this stylish haven in the heart of the city, located just minutes from Chennai International Airport. Explore the nearby historic Mylapore district, home to the colourful Kapaleeshwarar Temple and San Thome Cathedral Basilica, or savour the rich flavours of South Indian cuisine at the hotel's Samudra restaurant. To unwind, retreat to the tranquil spa or take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool.
offer_address: 1/24 Grand Southern Trunk Road, Chennai 600 027, India

title: Eastern India Five-Star Beachfront Luxury with Four Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Experience effortless beachfront luxury at the five-star InterContinental Chennai Mahabalipuram Resort, an IHG Hotel, set near eastern India's waterfront district of Chennai overlooking the glittering Bay of Bengal. Treat yourself to rejuventing treatments at Amrtam spa or satisfy your cravings at one of four mouthwatering eateries and bars, including traditional Chinese with a modern twist at Tao of Peng restaurant. Guests can also plunge into the glistening pool or stay active in the onsite health club.
location_description: InterContinental Chennai Mahabalipuram Resort, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 212 East Coast Rd. Nemelli Village, Perur, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 603104, India

vendor_name: Holiday Inn Express Chennai Omr Thoraipakkam
title: Vibrant Southern India Chennai Escape with Express Cafe Breakfast Bar
description: Chennai's colourful city is yours to explore from Holiday Inn Express Chennai Omr Thoraipakkam, an IHG Hotel. Here, find everything you need for a comfortable escape, from the Express Cafe serving Grab and Go breakfasts and piping hot coffees, to the fully equipped fitness centre and the self-serve 24-hour laundromat. When you're ready to explore, ISKCON Chennai Temple and many golden beaches are within reach.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Chennai Omr Thoraipakkam, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No 5/395, Nehru Nagar, OMR Road, Chennai 600097, India

title: Elegant Five-Star Indian Escape with Four Onsite Restaurants
description: Experience true Indian opulence with a stay at the lavish Crowne Plaza Chennai Adyar Park, an IHG Hotel. This diverse city offers an authentic South Indian experience where you will discover an array of culinary, artistic and religious customs. Bask in the glorious sunshine while enjoying the point where the city meets the ocean at Marina Beach, known around the world as one of the longest stretches of uninterrupted coast, before returning to enjoy a meal at one of the onsite restaurants.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Chennai Adyar Park, an IHG Hotel
